name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Development Engineer with 13+ years of experience adept in building robust applications, utilizing skills in **C++**, **C#**, unit testing, design patterns, and Agile methodologies. Proven track record in implementing **automated testing** strategies and utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **Azure Pipelines** for efficient CI/CD processes. Expertise in software development lifecycle and delivering high-performance solutions in compliance-driven environments.
Previously excelled as a Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in deploying **cloud-native systems** on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Strong background in developing AI/ML platforms with MLOps skills in model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, while ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
